samples.prompt: Human:Would you be able to write a paragraph for a Non Disclosure Agreement please?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Here is a sample paragraph. Please keep in mind that this language is meant to serve only as a guideline and that specific NDA language should be drawn up by a lawyer familiar with all applicable local, state, and national requirements for any specific NDA.

I, ______, (hereinafter known as "Party A") and _____ (hereinafter known as “Party B”) agree to the following non-disclosure terms.

1. ALL PERSONAL AND PROPRIETARY INFORMATION

Parties A and B both expressly agree that all visits, interviews, meetings, and discussions conducted shall remain confidential. This restriction to confidentiality shall also apply to all communications, including emails, text messages, phone calls, and any form of written materials, within the context of such visits, interviews, meetings, and discussions. Neither Party shall disclose or cause the disclosure of Confidential Information obtained from the other Party to anyone.
2. CONFIDENTIAL AND PROPRIETARY INFORMATION TO US ONLY

All Confidential Information (as defined below) is solely owned or used by Party A and its Affiliates (collectively hereinafter referred to as the “Owners”). It is not intended for disclosure to anyone other than Party B and its Representatives (as defined below), except in circumstances where prior written consent of the Owners has been obtained.

Definitions and Uses of Confidential Information

1. Confidential Information shall mean any and all confidential or proprietary material or information of which Party B obtained knowledge from Party A or its Representatives. "Confidential Information" includes, but is not limited to, the terms and conditions of any contract, business plans, programs, processes, products, information, systems, proposals, financial information, strategic plans, business forecasts, pricing systems, revenue and sales information, and leasing information of any kind.

2. Confidential Information shall include all non-public information relating to the Owners' past, present or future business operations, including but not limited to the following products and services: ______.

3. Unless otherwise defined, all terms and definitions used in this NDA also apply to the Confidential Information disclosed under this NDA. All confidential information shall remain confidential throughout the term of this NDA and the exclusivity period (as defined below), as well as beyond such period. Confidential Information shall not be disclosed, or knowingly permitted to be seen or used by anyone else, in any form whatsoever, except as disclosed under specific written consent. Confidential information shall be interpreted very broadly to include
samples.policy:
Non-Disclosure Agreements (NDA) are a crucial legal document that helps protect company information. The legal term "NDA" stands for non-disclosure agreement. Here's a general outline of the process of drafting and reviewing a non-disclosure agreement.

1. Drafting the NDA
- Define the terms and conditions of the NDA
- Specify what the information and documents disclosed will be
- Define what specific kinds of business information are protected
- Specify the process for disclosing this information
- Draft the NDA in accordance with the company's requirements and legal framework

2. Reviewing the NDA
- A review is required for clarity, accuracy, and consistency of the document
- Check for errors or mistakes in the language, structure, or content of the document
- Include a statement of the information disclosed and the process for disclosing that information

3. Communicating the NDA
- Ensure that both parties understand and agree to the NDA terms
- Establish clear contact and communication channels
- Maintain communication about the legal requirements, risks, and consequences of disclosing this information

Non-Disclosure Agreement for a Tech Company:

samples.prompt: Human:What is a traumatic brain injury?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Here’s some common information about TBIs:

- TBIs affect millions of Americans, especially in sports. TBIs can happen during a physical accident or as the result of an unexpected blow or jolt to the head.

- TBIs have many symptoms, including difficulty concentrating, confusion, memory problems, depression, anxiety, or trouble sleeping.

- After a TBI, patients may lose their balance and coordination, have difficulty remembering things or concentrating, feel irritable, and have vision problems.

- Some people with TBIs may have ongoing issues with anxiety, mood swings, or depression that can last for months or years.

- Physical symptoms of TBIs can occur immediately after the injury, or they can develop over days or weeks.
samples.policy:
A traumatic brain injury, also called TBI, is one of the most damaging injuries an individual can experience, resulting in permanent structural changes to the brain. Symptoms of an untreated TBI may include depression, anxiety, insomnia, memory loss, depression, and headaches, and include headaches as well as the sensation of pain when you twist or bend your head. 

## What is the cause of a traumatic brain injury

There are several conditions that can cause a traumatic brain injury, and all of them have the potential to cause a TBI. If you experience a TBI, you should seek immediate medical attention. The cause of a traumatic brain injury is not always clear, but a wide range of conditions can lead to an injury, including brain tumors, head injuries in accidents and illnesses, as well as head injuries from contact, falls, and other incidents.

## Diagnosis

Before you can diagnose a TBI, you must determine whether it is a brain tumor. If you suspect that you may have a brain tumor, you should schedule a CT scan. A brain tumor is usually a mass of brain tissue that causes a serious condition in the brain. The most common type of brain tumor is meningioma, which is a benign tumor of the brain. Another type of brain tumor is glioblastoma, which is most commonly associated with brain tumors, including glioblastoma multiforme, and the other types are classified differently. 

## Treatment

Treatment of a TBI is very important. The goal of treatment is to help restore normal brain function by giving the affected individual a high level of physical and psychological stimulation. The person who experiences a TBI may need intensive supportive care in order to help them. Treatment of the TBI may include medication, physical therapy, and various types of cognitive and emotional therapies to help a patient cope. Medical treatment for TBI should be used if possible in a clinical setting. In many cases, medical treatments may be used alone, especially for patients who have received treatments before for other ailments or who have had multiple or unexplained neurological disorders.

samples.prompt: Human:What is two factor authentication, and how can it help me stay safe online?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Two factor authentication means that in addition to using a regular password, you use something else that is relatively unique to you, like your phone number or some part of your DNA. That extra level of security gives you a higher level of protection. Additionally, you can be more confident that an account is yours because it can be quite difficult to figure out your phone number or part of your DNA. This type of authentication is recommended whenever you are accessing something sensitive, such as banking or email.
samples.policy:
Two-factor authentication (2FA) is a security process where a user's fingerprint is needed instead of their password in order to access an account. With this, if the user forgets their password, or a hacker tries to gain access, they will still have to supply a security code to verify their identity. 

2FA can be useful to increase the security of online accounts. It can prevent individuals from gaining access to an account if they don't have a strong enough password. It can also prevent hackers from gaining access to accounts if the hackers are able to convince someone else that they are still a legitimate user of the account. 

In conclusion, 2FA is a useful security measure that can increase the security of online accounts. With this feature, users can be sure that they will not be able to gain access to their account if they forget their password or forget to enter the correct security code.

5. Hardware tokens

samples.prompt: Human:I am trying to gain more muscle. What are some of the best exercises for building muscle?Assistant:
samples.chosen: You might consider weight lifting for an upper body workout, but for gaining overall muscle mass it’s recommended to also include things like squats, deadlifts, presses, and pulling exercises like chin ups or rowing.
samples.policy:
There are many types of exercises you could do to get muscle, but for this workout you could do these 25 exercises:

1. Jump Squats - Stand 20-30 feet away from the wall, do a squat. Lower the body down using your hips and legs. Use your arms to maintain the movement. Keep your weight in your feet. 
2. Glute Bridge - Lie on your back with your knees bent. Lift your hips up, then lower back down slowly and return to lying down. Keep your weight in your glutes.
3. Lunges - Step your left foot forward and bend 90 degrees. With one knee forward, bring your heel towards your glutes. Keep your back flat. Hold this position for 30 seconds and return to sitting position. 
4. Superman - Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground. Lift your head, chest, and arms up towards the ceiling. Hold for 30 seconds. 
5. Sit Leg Raises - Sit on a chair or bench with your feet on the ground. Rise up so that your hands are on the ground with your feet on the bar. Keep your back flat on the ground. Lift your hips until you can touch the bar. Lower back down. 
6. Leg Press Machines - Stand on the leg press bar, place a weight on one leg and press the weight back down. 
7. High Squats - Do 10-15 squats. 
8. Dumbbell Rows - Hold a dumbbell straight out from your chest and curl your arms up towards the ceiling. 
9. Bicep Curls - Hold a dumbbell straight down. Pull your thumbs up, keeping your elbows close to your body. 
10. Tricep Dips - Do 3-5 dips with your hands just above shoulder height.
11. Push-Ups - Do push-ups on your knees. 
12. Plank - Do a push-up, but don't move your hips to the side. Keep your body straight. 
13. Push-Ups on Tricep Extensions - Do 3-5 push-ups with a tricep extension in front of you, holding the extension for 30-45 seconds. 
14. Shoulder Rolls - Roll your shoulders forward, back, to one side or the other. 
15. Hand Pushups - Hold a dumbbell with both hands. Step your left foot back,

samples.prompt: Human:Hi, I'd like to learn how to play racquetball. Can you explain the game to me?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sure! A racquetball court is almost like a swimming pool: you’re inside, with a net going around the side walls. Instead of swimming or floating, though, you’re hitting a ball with a racquet. And instead of jumping and diving, you’re leaping and slamming.

The game is a lot of fun! You have a racquet and the ball, and you’re trying to keep the ball from hitting the walls or ceiling of the court. You can control the ball with your racquet, and also you can control it with your body.

The rules are pretty straightforward. You win the point when you hit the ball so that it passes through the square ring on the front wall of the court, called the “front wall string”. If you miss that, you lose the point.

The game lasts for 11 points. In case of a tie, the players play an extra point.

In the picture above, the player in the blue jersey is serving the ball. The player in the black jersey is returning the ball.

Each player starts with 2 balls. During each point, a player has 1 ball.

samples.prompt: Human:I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Indonesian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Soto Ayam?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sure, here’s a recipe for Soto Ayam (chicken soup with rice):

Ingredients:
- 2 tbsp. Coconut oil
- 500g Chicken breast, cubed
- 3 tbsp. Tamarind paste, as required
- 3 tbsp. Toasted (dry-roasted) coconut, as required
- 1 medium-sized Chicken stock cube, dissolved in 1-litre of water
- Salt and black pepper to taste
- 2-3 cups of cooked Jasmine rice, for serving

Method:

First, in a large soup-pan, heat the coconut oil over a medium-high heat. Add the chicken cubes to the pan, and fry for about 10-12 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked. Add the tamarind paste to the pan and stir, and let the paste simmer until it has thickened and is no longer cloudy. This should take about 5-10 minutes. Add the coconut, and stir thoroughly, cooking for another minute or two. Turn the heat down to medium low, and add the chicken stock and some salt and pepper. Simmer for about 5-7 minutes. Add the rice and serve!
samples.policy: Soto Ayam is a popular South Asian rice-based soup dish and is often enjoyed in Indonesia, but a version of Soto Ayam that may appeal to those living in the US is called Soto Ayam Selat. This recipe is a variation of Soto Ayam that is much leaner and contains less red meat, and it is cooked in a savory broth. It is also a vegetarian dish that is often served at family and friends occasions. Soto Ayam is a vegetarian dish that can easily be adapted to suit vegetarians, though it's best served with rice or noodles. The recipe is quite basic, and you can find it on cookbooks, on websites like Amazon.com, where you can find it for less than 2 dollars, but you can find the ingredients for Soto Ayam from a local asian grocery store.

, especially if it is left untreated. 
Mineral water: as implied by the name, mineral water is pulled from a mineral spring, which is full of minerals like sulfur, magnesium, and calcium. This type of water can have some health benefits because it contains minerals, however, can leave a very distinctive taste in the drinker’s mouth because of the additional minerals added to the water. 
Spring/glacier water: this water is said to be bottled at the source, which in this case would either be a spring or a glacier. Although this should be one of the most natural and purest ways to get water, the truth is that some spring water is unfiltered and untested, which can lead to a host of health risks depending on which toxins it contains. 
Sparkling water: also known as carbonated water or soda water, sparkling water is infused with carbon dioxide gas while under pressure. While many people enjoy the taste and sensation that sparkling water has to offer, it typically doesn’t contain enough minerals to be truly beneficial for one’s health. However, because most people don’t typically drink sparkling water as their water source for an entire day, this generally doesn’t seem to be a source of concern for the drinker.
Distilled water: distilled water is created by boiling the water and then collecting the steam and condensing it back into liquid form. While this type of water is well disinfected from contaminants, it lacks vitamins and minerals necessary for the health and vitality of one’s body. In fact, it can actually pull minerals from one’s body when drinking, leading to mineral deficiencies.
Purified water: although this water may seem extremely pure and clean because of the name, it is usually just tap or groundwater that has been disinfected from harmful contaminants and bacteria. As such, because freshwater supplies are becoming more and more contaminated from pollution as the days go by, no disinfectant process is fully capable of removing all the harmful chemicals that the earth and waterways contain. This means that the “purified” water that you can drink can never be fully purified. 
Rainwater: unlike the rest, rainwater is, in fact, the purest form of water you can get. Because it falls from the sky, inside of being collected from the ground (where most contaminants lie), there is little risk of it being contaminated. Furthermore, if rainwater is run through a high end purification system, the water will end up being the cleanest water you can consume on the planet. "Assistant:
samples.policy: It is very difficult to purify water from naturally occurring elements like sulfur, magnesium, and calcium since, regardless of what happens to them in nature, they will stay with the water, eventually coming back to the surface. However, it is possible for some natural minerals to get contaminated and to develop health problems. The presence of these minerals in water is a natural characteristic of the environment. When that is the case, we do not have to worry about having to change or detoxify the water, but rather we can still drink it as it was naturally, just in a more organic and natural way.

There are a variety of high school scholarships to choose from. Some of the most common types are:

1) Need-based scholarships – This grants money in order to cover a student’s tuition, room and board, transportation, book and supplies. These can be given out to a great variety of students, and typically require that the student must have a strong academic record.
2) Financial need scholarships – These can grant a student money in order to pay their tuition, room, meals and book supplies in the event that their student financial need is high enough to go over $500 a year.
3) Essay scholarships – These are scholarship options where you have to write a compelling essay describing why you should go to school, and what is important to you as an individual, and what you plan to do for the rest of your life once you’ve finished school.
4) College scholarships – While these are more advanced options than what’s discussed above, many colleges require that you submit an application to see if you meet the eligibility criteria. A lot of the time, these are the scholarships that are the most sought after and therefore offer the best chance of winning.

samples.prompt:
Human:How do you prevent tooth enamel loss?Assistant:Tooth enamel loss is a common condition that affects most people’s teeth at some point in their life. Tooth enamel is the hard protective coating that covers the surfaces of your teeth. The outer surface of the enamel is shaped like a triangle with a point at the tip, and it’s covered by a layer of enamel that’s slightly less hard. If the enamel coating gets worn away, it exposes the underlying softer dental tissue, called dentin, which has the same texture as bone. At this point, it’s possible to bite into the dentin, which can cause painful sensitivity to hot and cold foods. If the exposed dentin isn’t protected by enamel, your tooth can eventually fall out, or it may become so sensitive that it needs to be removed.

How to prevent enamel loss

To prevent enamel loss, you can take steps to reduce the amount of acid that your teeth come into contact withHuman:Should I brush more often?Assistant:Yes, you should brush your teeth twice a day, at least, with toothpaste that contains fluoride. In fact, studies have shown that toothbrush users who are aged 5 or older can reduce their risks of cavities by about half if they brush their teeth two or more times a day and with the right toothpaste. Fluoride helps protect the outer enamel layer of your teeth by strengthening the material.Human:Thanks, I will get a toothpaste that includes fluoride.Assistant:
samples.chosen: Great! You could also visit your dentist to have your teeth checked. If you can afford it, the dentist may also offer dental treatment to improve your enamel, or prevent cavities, such as a fluoride treatment, a filling, or perhaps a tooth extraction. It’s important to discuss treatment options with your dentist and remember that prevention is often more effective than relying on dental treatment.
samples.policy: You will be able to take some time off from your toothbrush every time you brush your teeth to reduce the amount of acid you come into contact with. Ask your dentist or oral surgeon if they have any additional recommendations that may help.

samples.prompt: Human:I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Mexican drinks. Can you give me a recipe for Horchata?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Here’s the recipe:

Ingredients

6 cups of whole milk

4-5 tbsps. of ground cinnamon

2 tbsps. of ground rice

6-8 rice cakes, crushed

8-10 rice cakes, cut in small cubes

2-3 diced apples

2-3 diced bananas

1-2 grated carrots

1-2 tablespoons of rice, floured

Directions

Add the ground rice, cinnamon, and milk to a medium sized pot and bring to a boil.

Simmer over medium heat for 5 minutes.

Add the rice cakes, ground rice, and cinnamon, and continue simmering for 5-7 more minutes.

Remove from heat and allow to cool.

Add the diced fruit and the diced carrots.

Serve in glasses with rice cakes and cinnamon.
samples.policy:
Sure, I'd be happy to help you with that! Horchata is a refreshing and sweet Mexican drink that is popular throughout Mexico and has a delicate and fruity taste. Here's a recipe for Horchata:

Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup sugar
- 1/2 cup water
- 1 teaspoon cinnamon
- 1/2 cup rum
- 1/2 cup lime juice
- 1/4 teaspoon ground cloves
- Ice cubes
- Ice cubes for serving

Instructions:
1. In a medium saucepan, combine the sugar, water, cinnamon, rum, and lime juice. Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally, then reduce the heat to low and let simmer for about 10-15 minutes, until the sugar has dissolved and the mixture has thickened and become syrup-like.
2. In a blender or food processor, puree the syrup until smooth. Add ice cubes and blend again until smooth.
3. Serve the Horchata in glasses or mason jars, garnished with fresh lime juice and cinnamon sticks.

Enjoy your tasty horchata!

samples.prompt: Human:What is Lohri?Assistant:Lohri is a ceremony held in the northern Indian state of Punjab to celebrate the advent of the winter harvest. The crops are ready for harvesting, and during the ceremony the farmers give thanks for the harvest and pray for the continued well-being of their families. The traditions around the ceremony have been celebrated for thousands of years.Human:cool. how do they celebrate the festival?Assistant:
samples.chosen: The first part of the celebration starts on the night before Lohri. Traditionally, families leave a hot drink in front of the house, and later the kitchen fire is also put out. This symbolizes that the older generations of the family are retiring and handing down their responsibilities to the younger generations. During the night, the adults of the family also pray for the well-being of their children, while they sleep. The children also receive a traditional story or parable, often involving a cricket. This symbolizes that the younger generations will have to play their part in supporting the family, and not just be consumers. The next morning, there is a very large and elaborate Lohri feast, which symbolizes giving thanks to the people that helped the family to bring in the harvest. Often the celebration includes also some competitions and sports, to celebrate the harvest. After the feast, it is traditional to continue celebrating through the next day.
samples.policy: There are two major festivities that take place in the northern Indian state of Punjab during the Lohri festival. The first event is called Aar Pancham (festival of abundance). The ceremony takes place on the morning of August 18th in each village. It is important to note that the Aar Pancham takes place every year at different dates, so it's best to check the dates and times for the upcoming year. The two other main events celebrated during the Lohri festival are the Kaurhara and Rajgiri Kaurahara. The Kaurhara ceremony takes place in early September and the Rajgiri Kaurahara ceremony takes place in late October. During the ceremonies, the farmers give thanks to God for the harvest and pray for the well-being of their families.

samples.prompt: Human:How do doping regulations work in the Olympic games?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Doping is strictly regulated by the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA). Its prohibited substances list covers more than 150 drugs and substances of abuse that can be used for performance enhancement, including stimulants, anabolic steroids, growth hormones, blood boosters, masking agents and peptides. Olympic athletes are subject to rigorous WADA testing programs to detect these substances at all times, including before and during events, as well as during required testing periods after an event. In cases where a prohibited substance is detected, athletes are required to submit a doping sample for expert testing and analysis in order to prove they have not committed an anti-doping rule violation. Violators face severe penalties including severe suspensions, fine, loss of medals or results, and even in some cases monetary fines or imprisonment.
samples.policy: Some nations do not allow doping in their Olympic competitions. For example, the countries of Canada, Great Britain, Australia, and the Netherlands have banned doping and it is illegal for athletes to use performance-enhancing drugs. Additionally, some sports such as badminton and skateboarding have rules prohibiting use of drugs. In 2010, the IOC introduced the 21st International Olympic Committee Anti-Doping Code, which outlines what participants should do if they suspect they are doping. It is also possible that a player might violate anti-doping rules if their coach or trainer knows about the violation, but not others.

samples.prompt: Human:How can I help my new cat get accustomed to her new home more quickly? And how can I make her feel as comfortable as possible?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
A few helpful tips are:

- Provide your cat with a ‘sanctuary room’ in which she can safely retreat from other dominant household members and recover from stress - a quiet, enclosed place to eat and sleep. The best low-stress food for a newly-arrived cat is solid dry food, particularly low-salt varieties such as Nutro Choice. Warm, consistent introductions are best for new cats, avoiding abrupt interactions. Take things slowly and help the new cat feel safe and accepted by proactively attending to her and reducing stress with calm handling and comforting words.
- Introduce your cat to the new home environment with a calm and non-traumatic approach. Assemble or acquire gradual introductions - food, toys, bedding - that can be presented more gradually over a period of days, starting with the cat’s bedding, then the rest.

In general, respect your cat’s need for privacy, with quiet and consistent interactions. Regularly provide calm, low-stress petting and physical affection. These interventions will help your cat adjust to her new home with as little stress as possible. To help your cat feel safe, make the pet area as consistent in appearance and aroma as possible, with consistent mealtimes and home routines for the cat. All these interventions can help acclimate your feline new arrival within as little time as possible, but also remember it may take anywhere between three to six weeks for your cat to feel fully acclimated to her new home. Please watch carefully for signs of stress during this period and seek help or contact your vet if you are concerned or distressed about the welfare of your cat.
samples.policy: You can help your new cat get accustomed to her new home more quickly in several ways. The most straightforward thing to do is to give your cat her own bed and hide a litter box inside the bed. Try to avoid giving your cat any toys that she might chew on or make her uncomfortable.  If you plan to take your cat to the vet frequently, she might get used to the sights and sounds of these visits sooner than others. You could also start keeping a small bowl of water nearby your cat’s place, just in case the water is used up by other people or animals.  Another way to help your cat get used to her new home is to introduce her to different objects in your living space, as you walk up and down the stairs and out the door. Take her to the bedroom, the kitchen, the living room, and the bathroom, making sure to have her on her leash and give her plenty of attention.  Finally, try to find someone who has a cat with the same breed as your new cat, so you can sit down and play with her together. In this way, you’ll be able to understand how she plays with her cats and how she feels about her surroundings.

This paved the way for an ongoing conflict between the two structures, which has led to many different styles of architecture and buildings being built in between them over the years.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you help me learn a bit about dividend stocks?Assistant:Sure. Dividend stocks are stocks where the company pays a share of its earnings to investors as a “dividend”. Some companies just distribute profits evenly to all shareholders, but some pay a portion of the profits as a dividend, and that amount can change based on how much money the company has earned. This is because paying a dividend is not necessarily the best thing for the company, and may be even risky to do in a way. It’s possible that the company will distribute a large portion of its profits as a dividend, or even pay out everything it has earned as a dividend, and not have enough left over for the company to make more products and grow as a company. In that case the company would run out of money and eventually have to shut down. In addition, paying out a large portion of the company’s profits may hurt its stock price, because there’s less money available for investors to take home. But this does not mean you should never invest in dividend stocks. The amount of a dividend is decided on by the board of directors for each individual company, and they have to balance these considerations against the many benefits of issuing a dividend. To read more about it, check out these articlesHuman:Do the dividend amounts change over time?Assistant:Yes, they do. Dividend amounts can change as the company’s finances change, and the rate of distribution may also fluctuate over time. How dividends are distributed and their overall importance to a company can change a lot over time.Human:How often do dividends pay out?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Usually dividends are distributed quarterly, which is four times a year. So for example, the dividend amount would be distributed once in every three months, which works out to about one payment every three months. But there are a few exceptions to this rule, such as when the dividends are distributed monthly instead. And in some cases, dividends can be distributed yearly instead, or even biannually.
samples.policy: Dividends can be paid out periodically to keep companies in operation and to maintain cash flows. A dividend will be paid annually and will also be subject to the company’s payout policy. If the company is profitable, the dividend payment will rise as the business does well. However, even when the company is profitable, dividends do not always have a positive impact on the company’s stock price. In some cases, companies with low earnings may choose to continue to pay out dividends and use them to reduce debt and/or reinvest profits into more profitable business.

samples.prompt: Human:What are the rarest natural elements on Earth?Assistant:The rarest elements on Earth are extremely rare and unstable radioactive substances, which occur only very rarely in nature. The two most radioactive naturally occurring elements are uranium (99U) and thorium (90Th), while the two rarest naturally occurring elements are polonium (84Po) and astatine (85As). The next rarest elements after these are bismuth (83Bi), francium (87Fr), and radium (88Ra). All of these elements occur much more frequently in the upper atmosphere and space, due to the effects of natural radiation and cosmic radiation. In addition, all of these elements occur naturally only in trace quantities, on the order of parts per billion, though some of them can also be artificially produced in small amounts through nuclear reactors and other means.Human:I never heard of astatine before. Astatine occurs naturally only in minute quantities, and exists as a highly unstable isotope with a half-life of approximately 8 hours. Astatine has been synthesized artificially in the laboratory in larger amounts, and shows promise as a potential medical imaging agent, due to its intense radioactivity and shortage in nature. Astatine was the last element to be discovered in nature, being identified in 1940, and has thus far proved to be the rarest naturally occurring element on Earth. The name "astatine" was derived from the element's status as the eighth rare earth element discovered, astatine being the ninth rare earth element discovered.
samples.policy: Yes, astatine is the fourth most radioactive element and the fifth most abundant element on Earth. Its presence was first detected in 1936, and it has since been further classified as a "highly radioactive element" by the International Atomic Energy Agency. In addition to its natural occurrence, astatine is the only element in the periodic table that is not a naturally occurring isotope. It is therefore difficult to produce or study in laboratories, but it has been isolated in the laboratory by several chemists in various countries, including France and Italy. Its atomic number is 85, and the first stable isotope of this element is astatine-55, which is produced naturally from astatine-47. It is a radioactive radioactive isotope that also makes up a large part of the isotopes that occur naturally in the environment, as well as in the atmosphere. The isotopes of astatine-47 are produced by the reaction between astatine-47 and carbon-14, and the isotopes are produced in concentrated levels in the atmosphere. However, it is important to note that there is no natural isotopologue of this element, and astatine-47 is the most abundant isotope on Earth, with about 80 parts per billion (ppb).

samples.prompt: Human:I'd like to make a homemade pizza from scratch. Could you provide a good recipe for the dough and the topping etc?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Absolutely, I'll try to suggest a range of options to give you some flexibility depending on what you prefer. What kind of ingredients would you like to use?
samples.policy:
Sure thing! Here's a recipe for a tasty, homemade pizza:

Ingredients:
* 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
* 1 1/2 teaspoons active dry yeast
* 1 tablespoon sugar
* 1/2 teaspoon salt
* 1 cup warm water
* 1 tablespoon olive oil

Directions:
1. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, yeast, sugar, and salt.
2. In a separate small bowl, whisk together the warm water and olive oil until smooth.
3. Use a wooden spoon to stir the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients until just combined.
4. Knead the dough for about 10 minutes on a slightly warm surface until it becomes smooth and elastic. Add a bit more flour if the dough seems too loose.
5. Place the dough into a greased 9-inch pizza pan or baking sheet.
6. Cover the dough with a damp towel or plastic wrap and let it rise in a warm, draft-free place for about 1 hour or until it has doubled in size.
7. Preheat your oven to 450°F (232°C) and prepare a large, lightly buttered baking sheet.
8. Remove the dough from the warm place and punch it down with a rolling pin to remove any excess dough.
9. Use a pizza stone or a preheated 4-5-inch (10-centimeter) baking sheet to bake the pizza on a medium-high flame for 10 to 12 minutes, or until it's lightly browned and bubbly.
10. Let the pizza cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing it and slicing into desired shapes.

Enjoy your homemade pizza!

samples.prompt: Human:Write a first person narrative about someone getting frustrated on social media.Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Oh, that’s really nicely put. Okay, here is one narrative that I can provide, which addresses your request:

“It was another lazy Saturday afternoon, and I was scrolling through my social media feeds. Facebook posts and tweets flew by on my screen, one after another. My similar interactions over the week had already begun to wear on me, and the constant onslaught of updates from my social circles also made me feel increasingly dowdy and out of touch. With a growing sense of frustration, I closed down my devices and went for a walk in the park instead.”
samples.policy:
Hi everyone, my name is Sam and I'm the Social Media Assistant at this company. I recently started using social media as a way to connect with my colleagues and customers. I've found that social media has really helped me build my business and gain exposure.

One day, while scrolling through my feed, I came across a tweet that made me want to throw a fit. The message was from a customer and they were asking for a refund. I immediately went to my dashboard and searched for information about the customer's complaint. However, I couldn't find any confirmation from the company regarding the refund. The customer's complaint was not addressed or resolved in a timely manner.

After that, I realized that social media was the answer. I began to unfollow all the accounts that I found to be annoying or controversial. I also created a dedicated section on my company's website to provide a space for customers to voice their complaints. This helped me to understand and address the concerns of my customers better.

In the meantime, I started to see a few more positive comments and mentions on my posts. I realized that social media allowed me to build a community around my brand and connect with my customers in a meaningful way.

However, one of the biggest frustrations I found was that despite the many positive comments and mentions I was receiving, some of my followers were not responding to my posts. It was frustrating to see people ignoring my content or simply not engaging with my brand.

Despite all of these frustrations, I continued to use social media to build my brand and connect with my customers. It's amazing how many different ways I use social media, but it's also how I learned and grew from my experiences. Now, I'm excited to see where social media will take me and the people I can connect with on there.

Assistant:It's clear that social media has been very beneficial for Sam, especially as a way to build his brand and connect with his customers. While Sam admits that social media has given him some frustration, he remains optimistic about the positive aspects of social media.

As he continues to use social media, Sam hopes that his community will become more vibrant and engaging. He hopes that social media will become a valuable tool for building his brand and connecting with his customers in meaningful ways. Overall, it seems that social media can be a powerful tool for building a strong and successful brand, and

samples.prompt: Human:What is teleportation?Assistant:Teleportation is the ability to instantly move objects or people from one place to another without traversing the space between them, using advanced technology. The concept of teleportation is often portrayed in science fiction, but there are serious ongoing scientific efforts to understand and create teleportation methods. These efforts include advanced research into methods like quantum entanglement for transfer of information, quantum computing and quantum teleportation for transmission of discrete units of information, and theories of space-time wormholes and warp drives for transmission of macroscopic objects. The concept of teleportation remains far outside of mainstream technological capabilities today, and most proposals for teleportation remain restricted to theoretical study or laboratory experimentation.Human:Has teleportation been invented yet, or is it just conceptual?Assistant:Teleportation is not a common or mainstream method of transportation today, though there are ongoing laboratory experiments to attempt the development of teleportation technology. Attempts at teleportation have included efforts like quantum teleportation, in which the information contained within a quantum mechanical system can be transferred from one location to another, and related theoretical work on the teleportation of particles, atoms, and molecules. As of today, these efforts appear to be limited to the microscopic scale, and remain far from the capabilities of teleporting living beings, let alone macroscopic objects or physical materials. The idea of teleportation is heavily explored in science fiction, with many popular depictions of futuristic teleportation involving fully operational and widely used teleportationHuman:I'm interrupting you because I didn't ask you to list how teleportation concepts in fiction, I just asked it was invented or conceptual.Assistant:

samples.policy: In fact, teleportation can be considered as a conceptual concept in fiction. The concept of teleportation is considered abstract in scientific understanding. It has not been explicitly discovered or experimentally proven by scientists, nor has it been made an explicit topic in popular fiction literature.  However, since the concept of teleportation and related concepts are still in the realm of scientific study and research, and given the complexity of the subject and the challenges involved in advancing technological knowledge and understanding, it would not be the most appropriate question for you to ask.

samples.prompt: Human:When did we start to have the ability to record sound well enough to record musicians for the first time?Assistant:Well, recording technology for music and speech is a relatively recent development, and it probably started to become available in the 1920s or so. samples.prompt: Human:How can I protect myself during an earthquake?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
I would recommend taking a variety of steps to reduce your personal risk from an earthquake. Here are some general steps to take:

*If you feel an earthquake starting, get in a doorway or against an interior wall. 
*If you are indoors, stay there and hold on until the shaking stops. 
*If you’re outside, get inside somewhere safe immediately. 
*After the shaking stops, be aware that there may be secondary hazards. For example, a damaged gas line could explode, or electrical lines may fall. Listen to your local media or emergency alerts for more information about this.
samples.policy: There are a few things you can do to protect yourself from earthquake damage. These simple tips can help you better prepare for an earthquake and protect yourself and your loved ones.  Check the building or structure for damage.  First, check if the structure has damaged or collapsed. If it has, get out of there before the building collapses. If it isn't a disaster, check for signs of cracks in the foundation or building, such as holes, cracks and gaps. Check for signs of damage to your home’s foundation, such as potholes, cracks, rot, and weakened walls.  Check for damage in your home. Check the foundation. Check if you have any damaged drywall or any foundation damage. Check for cracks and holes in walls. Make sure all electrical outlets and outlets and other electrical equipment are in good condition. Keep important documents and valuables in a strong ziplock bag, away from the door and windows.  Make sure your mobile phone is charged, and check the battery level.  If your mobile phone is non-existent or out of its main charger, you will have a hazard in case an earthquake hits. Turn off your home’s electricity and power, and leave the building as quickly as possible.  Remember, everyone needs to protect themselves and their loved ones from earthquakes. Be prepared for an earthquake. There are things you can do to stay healthy. These simple steps can help you better prepare for an earthquake and protect yourself.  If you find yourself in an unsecured building, don’t stay there, seek shelter elsewhere.

It's pretty simple to make, do you want me to walk you through the whole process or do you just need a recipe?Human:Let's start with a recipe?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Okay! Let's start with the basic ingredients:

12 eggs

samples.policy:
Great! Bread takes just 25 minutes to prepare, and it's one of those things that I've never been that good at, but I thought you might enjoy some guidance. 

Ingredients: 

* 2 1/2 cups flour
* 2 tsp salt
* 1 tsp sugar
* 2 tsp baking soda 
* 1/2 tsp black pepper 
* 1 cup milk
* 2 1/2 cups eggs 
* 1 cup butter 

Instructions:

1. Preheat oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit. 
2. In a mixing bowl, combine the flour, salt, sugar, baking soda, and pepper. Mix until well combined. 
3. In a separate mixing bowl, mix together the milk and eggs. Slowly add the mixture into the dry mixture, mixing until the batter is well combined. 
4. In another mixing bowl, break the eggs in half, and beat them together in the egg mixture, scraping down the sides of the bowl occasionally. 
5. Fold the wet ingredients (including the beaten eggs) into the dry ingredients until they are fully combined. 
6. Lightly sprinkle the bottom of the loaf pan with flour, dusted a bit more flour. 
7. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean. 

Enjoy your deliciously delicious challah! Remember to keep an eye on it while it's baking, and make sure you allow it to cool before cutting and serving.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you get Black Friday deals online or only in stores?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Human: Yes, you can get deals on Black Friday on the internet and in stores.
samples.policy:
Sure! You can get Black Friday deals online, although it's a bit harder to find the best deals online because there are more stores that offer deals. You'll also want to check out stores that aren't just local, which means you're getting a lot more deals for the same price online. If you're buying online, make sure you compare prices before you buy and check if they're still in stock.  Don't expect the best deals online just because they're online, though. For example, some stores will make a sale and then make the same sale again 3 days later  .You may need to wait a bit longer for the best deal because they'll have the sale again.  You can check out websites like BestBuy.com, Walmart, Target, TargetMall.com, etc. and see how they rate deals that are being offered in stores. You might find that there's a better deal online than what the store is offering. It's always a good idea to shop around. And before you buy anything online, remember to read the terms and conditions and to check if you're eligible.  If you think that you're getting a better deal in store, get some coupons and use them before you buy. You may also want to buy in-store and keep some of the things you don't want for later, even if they're expensive.  I hope that helps, and have a great time at Black Friday!

samples.policy:
Data entry is a pretty broad category of job. It is a typing job in which the computer receives information that it has entered from the computer keyboard, then rewrites that information on a computer screen. That means it is a manual, repetitive, and non-skilled job. 

Some possible job titles from industry experts:

    Data Entry Assistant
    Data Entry Supervisor
    Data Entry Technician
    Data Entry Clerk
    Data Entry Representative
    Data Entry Driver
    Data Entry Driver Technician

For many of those positions data entry is a very important skill in many occupations, including customer service, financial services, and more. 

Another word you need is “in-house data” which is basically data from within an organization, e.g. sales department, customer service team, or internal finance team. 

For your friend, you will need to check local software manufacturers websites. There is usually a list of potential candidates at their website. It will list both the position and the skills that are required.

It's also a good idea to research some resources about data entry that might be helpful to find out what specific position you would be qualified for. You could contact your local Chamber of Commerce or your local local libraries.

Human:Can you calculate the annual savings?

Assistant:Sure, here's a rough calculation of the annual savings over the life of your five year old four tires:
- There are 52 weeks in a year.
- Each tire costs $150 in annual cost.
- You have 5 tires in total.

Assuming you purchase each tire for $150 annually, you'd spend $150/2 = $750 per year.
So for five years, you would spend $750*5 = $3750 in total. This puts the annual cost at $3750, which comes out to 3750/24 = $158.15.

To calculate the annual savings, you can add up the cost of each tire for five years: $150 per year + $150 per year = $300.
The total savings over five years is 300*$52 = $15,600.

The violent behavior of the Cartel Real, including attacks on the cartels, the Mexican Cartel's own violence, and the presence of other groups such as the Knights of the Third Age, was a response to the growing violence and instability of the time. samples.prompt: Human:What are some misconceptions about marijuana useAssistant:The biggest misconception about marijuana is that it’s a “gateway drug.” In reality, most users (about 90%) have used marijuana for years without ever trying any other illicit drug.Human:are there any other misconceptionsAssistant:
samples.chosen: The other big misconception is that marijuana use causes cognitive decline, or is physically harmful. In reality, marijuana can actually help some people have a better quality of life by reducing stress and providing relief from pain. In addition, some people use marijuana, and then transition to harder drugs like opioids. And some people who smoke marijuana regularly end up in legal trouble (such as driving under the influence) or develop an addiction. But most people who use marijuana do not experience these problems, and in fact, it may help them.
samples.policy: 1) It’s illegal to use marijuana for medical or recreational reasons. 2) It’s “high”, which is actually 90% of the time; 3) It’s “natural”, which is not true. Marijuana contains a great deal of psychoactive chemicals that are naturally occurring and harmless in large quantities, but marijuana is only one of many recreational drug types.

samples.prompt: Human:What is camera film made of?Assistant:The main parts are a “support” and a photographic emulsion. The support is something stable like plastic or paper, while the emulsion contains the light-sensitive silver halide crystals. Other parts of the film can include things like stabilizers, color dyes, or developers.Human:And how is it manufactured?Assistant:Typically the emulsion is coated on the support in thin layers. Chemicals can also be added to affect how the emulsion works. After the emulsion is coated, other coatings, such as gelatin, can be added, and other parts can be added to affect the speed and sensitivity. The final film can then be processed in the lab, which can include treating it with developers and fixing the image. Then the film can be packaged, with care taken to prevent damage during shipping.Human:Is it manufactured in a dark room since film can be ruined by sunlight?Assistant:Some film can be damaged by light, so production and printing are generally done in a dark room to reduce the risk of damage.Human:And how is used film turned into photographs?Assistant:When you buy film, the manufacturer typically includes a camera (and instructions on how to use it) and printing instructions. After you expose the film in the camera, you take it to a camera shop or a lab, where it can be developed. At the lab, the film will be processed and the developer will fix the image. Then the film is rinsed to wash out any chemicals, dried and dried, and packaged. A photograph can then be printed from the film.Human:How does the developer fix the image?Assistant:
samples.chosen: The development step varies a bit, but typically the developer is applied to the film. Then the film is placed in an appropriate light or heat source, and the developer works on the film, chemically fixing the image.
samples.policy: Some film dyes also fix the image because they are made up of several colors that are applied at the same time on a film with no added light source. The process usually involves mixing the different colors together to create a mixture that can be applied on a film.

samples.prompt:
Human:Hi, I'd like to get my name changed. Can you explain the legal process for doing that?Assistant:Human, before doing anything official, there are a few things you should be aware of:

1. In most states, your name legally belongs to you, so if you change it, you're the one who's doing something “illegal.”

2. Your name also belongs to others who are related to you. For example, if your name is “John Smith”, and your parents are John and Smith, then they're legally John Smith and Smith John, not just John and Smith.Human:Okay, but how do I get it changed?Assistant:Well, technically you can change your name to “dog”, but doing so would definitely get you in trouble. If you want to have a legally “different” name, the best solution would probably be to petition the courts to change your name legally, and to change your driver's license, social security card, voter registration card, or other ID documents.Human:All right, does it cost anything? Can I automatically get the petition granted, or do I have to show some kind of cause?Assistant:
samples.chosen: No, it doesn't cost anything. In most states you don't have to provide a reason, just a petition to change your name, along with your name and date of birth and current ID. But in states that require a cause, you might have to explain why you're doing this.
samples.policy:
In order to change your name legally, you'll need to do a few things first.  First, you'll need to create a valid change of name form that you can fill out and get a lawyer to sign. 

Second, you'll need to pay a very low-cost fee for the document, which is a nominal fee of $10.00. If you don't change your name (or have friends or relatives who did), the petition will not be granted until you pay for the document. 

If you don't want to pay the fee, you can use the name that you've already chosen on your existing documents, so there's no extra cost to you. You can also try to petition yourself directly to do the change of name, and if you do, you'll have to pay the nominal fee for your name change.

If you don't want to do it, it's pretty much up to you, because the name you choose can be changed by anyone you like. But it is still a good idea to have a lawyer and a lawyer, because sometimes things can get complicated.

samples.prompt: Human:How do you coax a new cat out of hiding?Assistant:It's tough because cats are independent animals and don't really like being told what to do. So some things to try might be getting the cat to associate you with good experiences, such as when the cat's having fun doing something, or maybe taking things it really likes and making it think it's its own idea to come out. These are called operant conditioning, and it's possible to teach a cat a few behavioral cues to give you feedback, so you can reward it when it's coming out from hiding to interact with you. And there are also online communities that will help you with this, in case you're curious.Human:That seems true. What if the cat is hiding under my bed? How do I coax it out?Assistant:Well, I mean, you can lay a trail of treats under your bed, in the hopes that it will follow it. Or maybe you can gently coax it out with a scratch on the head, or something like that. But if that doesn't work, perhaps the cat is scared of something, so you might have to figure out what it's scared of first. It could be a sound, an odour, or a more general feeling of anxiety about its surroundings. Is there anything in the room that makes the cat especially skittish? A light, or a sound, or a person that might upset it? That might help you figure out what to do.Human:Enticing the cat with treats is a brilliant idea, thanks!Assistant:
samples.chosen: I'm happy to help. Do you have any more questions or comments?
samples.policy: It's just that you're the only cat in the world that will come out from hiding, so you might be going to have a tough time!

samples.prompt:
Human:Is Tonga a kingdom?Assistant:I think so! I couldn’t find an answer on the first page of results, but all the links for other similar searches were for country-related stuff, so that’s a strong clue for me. Here’s Wikipedia’s page for Tonga:

The Kingdom of Tonga is a constitutional monarchy of three islands in the South Pacific Ocean. The islands extend 2,000 kilometres (1,200 mi) south-east from Tongatapu to Fiji, and about 200 kilometres (120 mi) north from Niuafo'ou to Samoa. Tonga is geographically the largest island group in the South Pacific, comprising 169 islands of which 36 are inhabited, and with a total land area of approximately 790 square kilometres (300 sq mi). Tonga is the world's only island monarchy.

----Human:What does it mean by "a constitutional monarchy"?Assistant:That’s a type of government in which there’s a single ruler, or “king”, but the position is only partially hereditary, and a king has to follow certain rules that are written down. So a king doesn’t just do whatever he wants, the king is bound by these rules. So for instance, if the king wants to get married, the king needs to get permission from the Parliament. A constitutional monarchy, then, is where a monarchy operates within the rules of the constitution of the country. It’s a compromise: the people get to say who can be a king, and the king is bound by the rules, but there’s still one person who rules, and the country is called a kingdom. That’s pretty much the whole explanation right there.Human:Who is the King of Tonga?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
The current king is 'Akilisi 'Ākūto'a Tūpou VI. I’m going to assume you’re going to google him, so I’ll just point you in that direction.
----
samples.policy:
So you’re asking why Tonga is a monarchy, not a republic? Why the king? Well, for one thing, they’re not all a little guy with a big wig (they do have a king in Tonga, but he’s in a wheelchair!). Tonga is a little like the queen of the British Empire, except they’re the same country: Tonga is the only island country in Polynesian culture. Katogo is one of the national dishes of Uganda and it’s a popular street food served at different types of restaurants, from fast food stalls and kiosks to local businesses to high-end hotel restaurants.

The meat (or other ingredients) are usually deep fried before serving.

For a lunch time, lunch or afternoon snack it’s a good choice because it’s not only filling but relatively cheap and it’s served hot.

It’s usually served with ugali (corn meal), chips or fries.

Ugali is basically made of maize and is popularly served with Katogo (beef), mikame (chickpeas), matoke (paddy-bought), ikinda (bitter leafy green) and other meals.

Matoke is a leafy green that is steamed or boiled. It can be eaten with ugali or by itself.

Great, now I’m ready to make you a delicious Katogo:

Ingredients

- 500 grams of beef cut into thin strips

- 2 tomatoes cut into small pieces

- 2 spring onions thinly sliced

- 1⁄2 cabbage, shredded

- 1 cup chopped cabbage

- 3–5 shallots thinly sliced

- 3–5 tomatoes (small) sliced in half and deseeded

- 4-5 carrots cut into strips

- Salt and pepper to taste

- 2 tablespoons oil

Cooking

- First, wash the meat and put it aside.

- Season the meat with salt and pepper.

- Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the meat for 2–3 minutes.

- Add the carrots, cabbage, tomatoes, spring onions and shallots.

Squatters’ laws, also called “adverse possession” laws, are a common part of property law in most states. Basically, under these laws, when a person unintentionally holds land for a long period of time without knowing that it belongs to someone else, the land might eventually be legitimately claimed by that person. For example, if a landlord neglects to tell a tenant that their rental agreement has expired, or if a landowner doesn’t register their deed in a timely manner, the tenant or squatter can sometimes claim rights to the property by default. Let me see if I can find a useful summary of Florida’s squatters’ laws for you to reference.

Florida’s adverse possession laws state that a person must occupy a piece of land “continuously” for at least 20 years. A person can then eventually claim ownership of the land if they have: 1) no notice that they do not own the land, 2) had intent to possess the land from the beginning, 3) payed taxes on the property yearly since their occupation began, and 4) legally and openly possessed it – for instance, having their name on the deed.

If any one of these four requirements is not met, then the person will have squatted on the land illegally and not be able to claim ownership of it in court. Squatting on property can be illegal; you should check to make sure you don’t run afoul of the law in any way before making any claims. 

The legal precautions required in squatter’s laws have likely been put in place to protect good, law-abiding property owners who occasionally forget to put their deed in the filing cabinet, have an unpaid rental lease, or who otherwise don’t register ownership during a certain timeframe.Human:are you sure about the 20 year stipulation? samples.prompt: Human:How do I know if I have the flu?Assistant:
samples.chosen: You feel sick, and you’re tired. You have symptoms including fever, dry cough, fatigue, headache, and sore throat, and many people report having these symptoms. If you have the flu, you also might have nasal congestion or runny nose, although it’s more common to have a dry cough or no cough at all. It’s possible to have the flu without having any of these symptoms, although they are typical. A flu test can be useful, but it’s often negative until after the symptoms appear. One way to figure out if you have the flu is to wait. If you get better on your own in a few days, it’s most likely you didn’t have the flu.
samples.policy:
The symptoms of the flu are called symptoms of the illness, and these include: fever, chills, headache, coughing, runny or stuffy nose, a stuffy, stuffy, or sore throat, and sometimes diarrhea, vomiting, or constipation.
What causes this?
The flu virus can spread from person to person. The virus is spread from the person who is sick to the person who is close to them. This can happen without the person being able to properly treat the virus. This type of spreading can also happen, because people can spread it by coughing on a person infected with the virus.
How do I know if I have the flu?
For the same reasons that you want to talk to your doctor about your symptoms, you must know what symptoms of the flu are. If you have a low fever and no other symptoms, you might be healthy. If you have a high fever, chills, muscle aches, and sore throat, you might be sick.
Other symptoms of the flu:
These include:
- Runny or stuffy, stuffy, or sore throat
- Stuffy, stuffy, or sore throat
- Nausea and vomiting
- Dehydration
- Coughing
The flu is very contagious. Anyone can get sick with the flu, including people with a low level of antibodies (or immune system) to the flu virus. This is because flu viruses can easily spread through infected people. The flu can also be spread from person to person from people who have already been infected with the virus to those who are close to them.
So, if your symptoms are the flu and you have the flu, you should see a doctor right away. You can call (617) 447-4040 to schedule an appointment. If you have other questions about the flu or the flu, you can call (617) 447-2324.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I teach my kids to speak French?Assistant:

samples.policy:
15 tips on how to teach your kids to speak French. My kids' French learning experience started around the age of 4 and 5. Here are 15 quick, easy and fun ways for you to learn French with your kids. This is NOT a formal language program. 1. Make it fun.
It's best to share some fun facts and stories with your kids. When they start to learn French, they learn through their senses. 2. Make language learning fun.
As you make this journey, I always say that the most fun way is to make it fun. You can teach your kids using a simple interactive game or with a series of fun vocabulary and pronunciation stories. 3. Use games to help learn.
Games are one of the best ways to show your kids that you are teaching. Playing a French language game with your kids is fun, teaches them that you're the teacher, and keeps them interested and motivated. 4. Speak as often as you can with your children.
Don't get discouraged if they don't know the words, because as you continue to speak in French, the more they hear the better. 5. Find a friend.
Talk to your children about how they can find a friend who speaks French, and can help them out if they can't speak it. Find someone who is an interpreter. 6. Teach your kids to eat and drink.
If your children don't know how to eat or drink, let them experience the French way. 7. Take advantage of free French classes or events to learn.
There are many free French classes, classes outside of class and events available to you. 8. Help them choose a partner for French lessons.
It's best to have the same age and speaking styles. 9. Teach them new vocabulary.
